name: Kubernetes Complete Observability - Coralogix Helmchart Supported

data.name: Kubernetes Complete Observability - Coralogix Helmchart Supported
data.description: View of key metrics relating to the health and performance of Kubernetes.

markdown.markdownText:
![image.png](data:image/png;base64,)

### Kubernetes Complete Observability (Coralogix Helm Chart supported)

This customizable dashboard provides comprehensive insights and real-time monitoring of your Kubernetes clusters, offering unparalleled visibility into the health and performance of your workloads and nodes. This dashboard tracks key metrics such as resource utilization, pod status, node availability, and network traffic to ensure optimal Kubernetes performance and reliability.

**Benefits:**
- **Improved Resource Management:** Proactive monitoring helps optimize the allocation of CPU, memory, and disk resources across nodes and pods, ensuring efficient utilization and performance.
- **Enhanced Cluster Health:** Early detection of potential issues minimizes downtime and ensures that nodes and pods remain healthy and responsive.
- **Optimized Costs:** Gain insights into resource utilization and cluster scaling to avoid unnecessary resource consumption and reduce operational costs.

**Details of integration to bring in Kubernetes Observability Dashboard** - [Kubernetes Complete Observability: Basic Configuration](https://coralogix.com/docs/opentelemetry/kubernetes-observability/kubernetes-complete-observability-basic-configuration/)

### Use Cases Covered

* **Cluster Overview**: Monitor key metrics like node count, pod count, and cluster health to get a comprehensive view of your Kubernetes environment's current state.
* **Resource Utilization**: Track CPU, memory, and disk usage across nodes and pods to ensure efficient resource allocation and prevent bottlenecks or over-provisioning.
* **Node Health Monitoring**: Keep track of node status and readiness to ensure optimal availability and performance of your Kubernetes cluster.
* **Pod Lifecycle**: Monitor pod creation, deletion, and error states to ensure workloads are running as expected and to troubleshoot issues quickly.
* **Network Traffic**: Analyze network traffic and packet flow between nodes, services, and external endpoints to identify potential network issues and ensure proper connectivity.
* **Container Metrics**: Gain insights into the status of containers, including resource utilization and error rates, to ensure containers are performing optimally.

You can duplicate dashboard  to create a custom K8sObservability journey suitable to your needs.

widgets.title: Current Resources - CPU
widgets.description: showing average CPU usage percentage, filtered by cluster and node

promqlQuery.value: sum(system_cpu_time_total{state!="idle", cpu!="", k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}"}) / sum(system_cpu_time_total{state!="", cpu!="", k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}"})

widgets.title: Resources - Memory
widgets.description: Ratio of used memory (excluding buffered, cached, and free) to total memory, filtered by cluster and node

widgets.title: Clusters
widgets.description: Count of Kubernetes cluster, filtered by cluster and node name.

widgets.title: Nodes
widgets.description: Count of Kubernetes nodes, filtered by cluster and node name.

widgets.title: Namespaces
widgets.description: Count of namespaces matching the selected cluster and node_name filters

widgets.title: Deployments
widgets.description: Count of deployment, filtered by cluster, node

widgets.title: Pods
widgets.description: Count of pods, filtered by cluster and node.

widgets.title: Containers
widgets.description: Count of containers, filtered by cluster and node.

widgets.title: Daemonset
widgets.description: Count of daemonset, filtered by cluster and node.

widgets.title: CPU Request
widgets.description: CPU requested for the pod

promqlQuery.value: max(k8s_container_cpu_request__cpu_{k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}", k8s_namespace_name=~"{{k8s_namespace_name}}", k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}"}) by (k8s_deployment_name, k8s_pod_name) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: CPU Limit
widgets.description: maximum cpu limit set for the pod

promqlQuery.value: max(k8s_container_cpu_limit__cpu_{k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}", k8s_namespace_name=~"{{k8s_namespace_name}}", k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}"}) by (k8s_deployment_name, k8s_pod_name) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: Memory Request
widgets.description: Memory requested

promqlQuery.value: max(k8s_container_memory_request_By{k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}", k8s_namespace_name=~"{{k8s_namespace_name}}", k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}"}) by (k8s_deployment_name, k8s_pod_name) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: Memory Limit
widgets.description: Memory maximum limit set for the container

promqlQuery.value: max(k8s_container_memory_limit_By{k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}", k8s_namespace_name=~"{{k8s_namespace_name}}", k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}"}) by (k8s_deployment_name, k8s_pod_name) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: CPU Request
widgets.description: CPU requested for the container

widgets.title: CPU Limit
widgets.description: Maximum CPU limit set for the container

widgets.title: Memory Request (MiB)
widgets.description: Memory requested for the container

widgets.title: Memory Limit (MiB)
widgets.description: Maximum memory limit set for the container

widgets.title: Namespaces Per Cluster
widgets.description: Namespace present in each cluster

promqlQuery.value: count(count(k8s_namespace_phase{k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}", k8s_namespace_name!=""}) by (k8s_cluster_name, k8s_namespace_name)) by (k8s_cluster_name, k8s_namespace_name)

widgets.title: Pods By Namespace
widgets.description: Count of pods grouped by namespace, filtered by cluster, node, and namespace name.

widgets.title: Containers By Namespace
widgets.description: Count of containers grouped by namespace, filtered by cluster, node, and namespace name.

widgets.title: Pods By Nodes
widgets.description: Count of pods grouped by Nodes, filtered by cluster, node, and namespace name.

widgets.title: Container Restarts
widgets.description: How many times the container has restarted in the recent past. (Metric Reference: https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/blob/main/receiver/k8sclusterreceiver/documentation.md#k8scontainerrestarts)

widgets.title: Container Restarts in the Selected Time-Range
widgets.description: How many times the Container has restarted in the specified time range. (Metric Reference: https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/blob/main/receiver/k8sclusterreceiver/documentation.md#k8scontainerrestarts)

widgets.title: Pod Restarts in its Lifetime
widgets.description: How many times the Pod has restarted in the specified time range. (Metric Reference: https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-collector-contrib/blob/main/receiver/k8sclusterreceiver/documentation.md#k8scontainerrestarts)

widgets.title: Container Memory Usage - % Used vs Limit
widgets.description: Percentage of memory used by containers relative to their memory limits

promqlQuery.value: 100 *(avg by (k8s_container_name,k8s_pod_name,k8s_cluster_name) (max_over_time(container_memory_working_set_By{k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}",k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}",k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}"}[1m])) / avg by (k8s_container_name,k8s_pod_name,k8s_cluster_name)(max_over_time(k8s_container_memory_limit_By{k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}",k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}",k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}"}[1m]))) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: Latest Pods Not Running by Cluster/Namespace (Pending Pods)
widgets.description: Count of pods in Pending status

widgets.title: Latest Pods Not Running by Cluster/Namespace (Failed/Unhealthy Pods)
widgets.description: Count of pods in Failed status

widgets.title: Total Deployments
widgets.description: Count of deployment, filtered by cluster, node

widgets.title: Daemonset
widgets.description: Count of daemonset, filtered by cluster and node.

widgets.title: Average Memory Usage Across Pods by Deployment
widgets.description: Average memory working set size per pod and deployment

widgets.title: Active Pods by Deployment
widgets.description: Count of pods per deployment

promqlQuery.value: count(count by (k8s_pod_name,k8s_cluster_name,k8s_deployment_name) (k8s_pod_phase_1{k8s_deployment_name!="",k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}",k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}", k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}"}==2)) by (k8s_cluster_name,k8s_deployment_name) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: Average CPU usage across pods in a deployment
widgets.description: CPU usage rate per pod and deployment

promqlQuery.value: sum(rate(k8s_pod_cpu_time_total{k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}", k8s_namespace_name=~"{{k8s_namespace_name}}", k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}"}[1m])) by (k8s_deployment_name, k8s_pod_name) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: CPU Usage Percentage (vs. limit)
widgets.description: Percentage of CPU usage relative to CPU limits

widgets.title: CPU Usage Percentage (vs. requests)
widgets.description: Percentage of CPU usage relative to CPU request

widgets.title: Running Pods
widgets.description: Count of pods

widgets.title: % Pods Running
widgets.description: Percentage of pods in the ‘Succeeded’ phase compared to total number of pods

widgets.title: Cluster (Total Nodes)
widgets.description: Count of nodes per Kubernetes cluster

widgets.title: CPU Utilization % Per Node
widgets.description: CPU usage rate per node

promqlQuery.value: sum(system_cpu_time_total{state!="idle", cpu!="", k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}"}) by (k8s_node_name) / sum(system_cpu_time_total{state!="", cpu!="", k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}"}) by (k8s_node_name) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: Memory Utilization % Per Node
widgets.description: Percentage of memory used (working set) relative to allocatable memory per node in the cluster.

promqlQuery.value: sum(system_memory_usage_By{state!~"buffered|cached|free", k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}"}) by (k8s_node_name) / sum(system_memory_usage_By{state!="", k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}"}) by (k8s_node_name) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: Disk Utilization % Per Node
widgets.description: Percentage of filesystem space used relative to total filesystem capacity per node in the cluster.

promqlQuery.value: sum(system_filesystem_usage_By{state="used", k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}"}) by (k8s_node_name) / sum(system_memory_usage_By{state!="", k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}"}) by (k8s_node_name) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: Network Received Bytes Per Node
widgets.description: Network receive throughput per node; Both metrics measure network bytes but at different layers — AWS at the ENI/hypervisor and OTEL at the OS level. Small gaps (~1%) arise due to timing misalignment, virtualization overhead, and differences in what’s included in “bytes processed.” The close trend match confirms accuracy; the residual gap is expected and normal.

widgets.title: Network Transmit Bytes Per Node
widgets.description: Network transmit throughput per node; Both metrics measure network bytes but at different layers — AWS at the ENI/hypervisor and OTEL at the OS level. Small gaps (~1%) arise due to timing misalignment, virtualization overhead, and differences in what’s included in “bytes processed.” The close trend match confirms accuracy; the residual gap is expected and normal.

promqlQuery.value: sum(increase(system_network_io_By_total{direction="transmit", k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}", device=~"eth1|eth0"}[1m])) by (k8s_node_name) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: Network Errors Per Node
widgets.description: Rate of network transmit/received errors per node

widgets.title: Pod Status - Total Pods
widgets.description: Count of total pods

widgets.title: Pod Status - Running Pods
widgets.description: Count of running pods

widgets.title: Pod Status - Succeeded Pods
widgets.description: Count of pod with status Succeeded

widgets.title: Pod Status - Pending Pods
widgets.description: Count of pending pods

widgets.title: Pod Status - Unknown
widgets.description: Count of pods with status as Unknown

widgets.title: Pod Status - Failed Pods
widgets.description: Count of failed pods

widgets.title: Pod Status - Total Restarts
widgets.description: Total number of container restarts

widgets.title: Cpu Utilization % Per Pod (vs limit)
widgets.description: average CPU utilization per pod

promqlQuery.value: sum(rate(container_cpu_time_s_total{k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}", k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}", k8s_namespace_name=~"{{k8s_namespace_name}}", k8s_pod_name=~"{{k8s_pod_name}}"})) by (k8s_pod_name) / max(k8s_container_cpu_limit__cpu_{k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}", k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}", k8s_namespace_name=~"{{k8s_namespace_name}}", k8s_pod_name=~"{{k8s_pod_name}}"}) by (k8s_pod_name) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: Memory Usage % Per Pod (vs limit)
widgets.description: average memory utilization per pod

promqlQuery.value: sum(container_memory_working_set_By{k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}", k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}", k8s_namespace_name=~"{{k8s_namespace_name}}", k8s_pod_name!="", k8s_container_name!="", k8s_pod_name=~"{{k8s_pod_name}}"}) by (k8s_pod_name, k8s_container_name) / sum(k8s_container_memory_limit_By{k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}", k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}", k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}", k8s_namespace_name=~"{{k8s_namespace_name}}", k8s_pod_name!="", k8s_container_name!="", k8s_pod_name=~"{{k8s_pod_name}}"}) by (k8s_pod_name, k8s_container_name) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: Network Received Bytes Per Pod
widgets.description: Network receive throughput (bytes per second) per node

promqlQuery.value: sum by (k8s_pod_name) (rate(k8s_pod_network_io_By_total{k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}",k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}",k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}",direction="receive", k8s_pod_name=~"{{k8s_pod_name}}"}[1m])) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: Network Transmit Bytes Per Pod
widgets.description: Network transmitted throughput (bytes per second) per node

promqlQuery.value: sum by (k8s_pod_name) (rate(k8s_pod_network_io_By_total{k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}",k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}",k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}",direction="transmit", k8s_pod_name=~"{{k8s_pod_name}}"}[1m])) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: Network Errors Per Pod
widgets.description: Rate of network transmit/received errors per pod

promqlQuery.value: sum by (k8s_pod_name,direction) (rate(k8s_pod_network_errors_1_total{k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}",k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}",k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}",direction="receive", k8s_pod_name=~"{{k8s_pod_name}}"}[1m])) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: Active Pods by Deployment
widgets.description: Count of pods per deployment

promqlQuery.value: count(count by (k8s_pod_name,k8s_cluster_name,k8s_deployment_name) (k8s_pod_phase_1{k8s_deployment_name!="",k8s_cluster_name=~"{{k8s_cluster_name}}",k8s_node_name=~"{{k8s_node_name}}",k8s_deployment_name=~"{{k8s_deployment_name}}", k8s_pod_name=~"{{k8s_pod_name}}"}==2)) by (k8s_cluster_name,k8s_deployment_name) or on() vector(0)

widgets.title: Failure Reasons - Container
widgets.description: count of container terminations by reason
